jobTitle.title: ASPIRING FULL STACK DEVELOPER
jobTitle.jobBrief: I am an aspiring Software Developer, UI/UX Designer and Full Stack Developer, studying at LC Studio.

about.aboutBrief: My name is Chandre Leigh Davids. I was born and raised in Rocklands, Mitchell`s Plain and that is where I currently reside. I am a very outgoing person, who is confident in her ability to establish connections with the people she meets. My love for coding sparked at an early age, which I can roughly pinpoint to Primary School, when I watched this movie about young programmer creating innovative solutions to everyday problems. This inspiration led me to explore the fascinating world of technology and development. I am a hard working individual who is always up for a challenge no matter how tedious it may seem. I absoloutely love learning new things. This is showcased through the fact that I am currently learning three languages, aside from coding, which are Mandarin, Korean and Arabic. My Hobbies include crocheting, knitting, dancing,singing and diy crafts and I put my  hobbies to use when I started my own business
about.aboutBrief2: I was born and raised in Rocklands Mitchell's and I currently reside there. I matriculated in 2023 with a bachelors degree. Worked as a casual before coming to Life Choices Academy. Learnt the basics of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, VUE.JS and Node.JS at Life Life Choice Academy. I`m able to speak and communicate in English and Afrikaans and I am hardworking as well as always up for a challenge. I'm a very outgoing person but when it is time for action I am a very disciplined person. This is shown through my commitment to Life Choices Academy and my small business.Learn More About my journey and by visiting the About page. Contact me by visiting the navigation bar above

education.descriptionMHS: My Primary School years were spent at Eisleeben Road Primary School but I attended Mondale High School throughout my highschool career.The subjects I majored in included
education.levelPassed: I passed with a Bachelor's degree
education.firstAidBrief: I obtained a first aid level 1 certficate in highschool
education.other: I am passionate about my work and I am committed to contributing to the growth and development of my community.I am excited about the endless possibilities that coding offers and am always eager to take on new challenges.

workExp.description: I casualed at UpperEdge at which I did filing and shredding
workExp.descriptionPIP: I am very proud to say that I officially launched my small business at the beginning of the year, in order to help my family out financially and in terms of profit , I calculated the total profit percentage so far 500% I have had my challenges in terms buying the materials needed for my business BUT I made a way to receive income by being a casual at accompany called UpperEdge, at which I did filing work. When my product was NOT selling a I hoped it would at a certain stage I adapted and brought in new project ideas that generated an entirely new source of income. Having a business has shown me that I can be very adaptive, strategic and innovative when things do not go as expected.

testimonials.name: Chloe Almazien
testimonials.message: Chandre is the most hard working person I know . She always holds her head high even in the face of adversity. Her gentle and kind nature is like that of a pink Saturn sheet both comforting and beautiful in its own right. she truly is a brilliant woman who will go far one day, that's a fact

testimonials.name: Keegan Niekerk
testimonials.message: Chandre is a very charming , intelligent and caring young woman who is always one to ask questions , and is always willing to help someone when asked. She is one who takes pride in her work and always strives to be the best in what she does. Chandre is the type of person who attracts people with her charm and intelligence , and is one of the friendliest people one could meet.

testimonials.name: Gwiba Mabandla
testimonials.message: One of the most caring and considerate people out there. She is very hardworking, and takes pride into knowing and understanding her work so everything is perfect. Don't  believe me? Check her note

testimonials.name: Oyintanda Zongwana
testimonials.message: Working with Chandre has been an absolute pleasure! Her dedication, and creativity have exceeded all expectations. She consistently deliver results and are a true asset to any team. I highly recommend Chandre for their outstanding skills and professionalism.

testimonials.name: Marcus Adonis
testimonials.message: Soft hearted person who loves working with people. Contributes a lot in a team to produce quality results. Very hard working and puts in 110% effort
